text: Sarah Catherine Hadland (born 15 May 1971) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Stevie Sutton in the BBC BAFTA-nominated sitcom Miranda (2009–2015), Linda Radleigh in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2011–2012), and Trish Collingwood in the ITV sitcom The Job Lot (2013–2015). Hadland appeared as the Ocean Sky receptionist in the 2008 James Bond film Quantum of Solace. Her other film roles include Magicians, Learners (both 2007), and Leap Year (2010). Hadland also appeared in the ITV comedy-drama series Moving Wallpaper as script writer Gillian McGovern (2008–2009), and had roles in the British comedy television shows That Mitchell and Webb Look (2008–2010), Horrible Histories (2009–2010, 2012–2013), and Brotherhood (2015). In 2016, she appeared in the BBC mini- series The Moonstone. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Cheshire
title: Sarah Hadland
